search.query: | inputlookup sto_asset_map_savedsearch.csv | stats count by splunk_server | eval label=splunk_server . " (" . count . ")"
| inputlookup sto_asset_map_savedsearch.csv | stats count by eai:acl.app | eval label='eai:acl.app' . " (" . count . ")"

| inputlookup sto_asset_map_savedsearch where is_scheduled=1 | search splunk_server="$srv$" eai:acl.app="$app$" | table splunk_server, object_title, eai:acl.app eai:acl.owner eai:acl.sharing, cron_schedule | rename splunk_server AS "Splunk Host", object_title AS "Search Name", eai:acl.app AS App, eai:acl.owner AS "Owner", cron_schedule AS "Search Schedule", eai:acl.sharing AS "Search Visibility"
